Title: Unused import
Content:
In [Monetary.sol](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/blob/17df84db351d5438e1b7437572722b4f52c8b2b4/contracts/protocol/lib/Monetary.sol#L21-L22) it is unnecessary to import the SafeMath and Math libraries as they are never used.


***Update:*** *Fixed in* [*pull request #210*](https://github.com/dydxprotocol/solo/pull/210)*.*
